case_title: IRSHAD KHAN vs GOHAR RAHMAN KHATTAK, ADVOCATE

bar_council_rules: Rules 134, 172, 175-A of Pakistan Legal Practitioners and Bar Council Rules, 1973
legal_provisions.legal_practitioners_act: Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973
legal_provisions.civil_procedure_code: Order 23, Rule 1 of Civil Procedure Code

legal_basis: Section 44 of Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973

key_arguments.respondent: Complaint should be dismissed as withdrawn under Civil Procedure Code provisions.
key_arguments.complainant: No objection to withdrawal if Rs 10,000 is paid.

precedent_case.title: Muhammad Amin v. M. Asghar Khokhar, Advocate
precedent_case.principle: Compromise does not erase professional misconduct.
